sentences.sentence: Thou changest not, Thy compassions, they fail not:As Thou hast been Thou forever wilt be.
sentences.translation: 祢不改变，祢慈爱永不转移，无始无终的神施恩不尽。

sentences.sentence: Because of the merciful compassions of our God, in which the rising sun will visit us from on high.
sentences.translation: 因我们神怜悯的心肠，叫清晨的日光从高天临到我们。

sentences.sentence: Lk. 1:78 Because of the merciful compassions of our God, in which the rising sun will visit us from on high.
sentences.translation: 路一78因我们神怜悯的心肠，叫清晨的日光从高天临到我们。
